answer: The Corp gains 2. Even though the Runner only triggered one ability, both subroutines were broken.
question: ####UFAQ [Damon Stone] If the Corp uses [Sub Boost](/en/card/07025) or [Sensei](/en/card/02034) to give Bailiff an additional subroutine, and the Runner uses [Breach](/en/card/05042) to break both subroutines at once, does the Corp gain 1 or 2?
